title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4501.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4501.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records produced during all hours regularly open for business. These hours are
9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4501.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
